paper_abstract: In this paper we present a method to obtain a C-r-Surface (r >= 1) on a polygonal domain which approximates a Lagrange data set and minimizes an "energy functional". The minimization space is formed by bivariate spline functions constructed on a uniform Powell-Sabin type triangulation of the domain. We prove a convergence result and we present a method for the estimation of the smoothing parameters involved in the functional. We finish with some numerical and graphical examples. (c) 2007 IMACS. paper_title: Minimal energy C-r-surfaces on uniform Powell-Sabin type meshes estimation of the smoothing parameters
